NN/IT_Cause: ETL lag or ingestion pipeline failure
Local_Effect: Incorrect turnaround time parameters in published dataset
System_Effect: Turnaround planning tools use outdated assumptions
Ops_Effect: Ground delays and potential constraint violations
Detection_Method: Automated dataset freshness and consistency checks
Mitigation/Compensation: Rollback to last approved dataset + initiate ERP bulletin to operators/MRO

NN/IT_Cause: Manual tagging error or tool config defect
System_Effect: Fleet/airport receives non-applicable procedures or limits
Ops_Effect: Use of wrong procedures/limits in operations
Mitigation/Compensation: Two-person rule on applicability + automated applicability validation

NN/IT_Cause: Network outage or API endpoint down
Local_Effect: No new airport constraint data received
System_Effect: Publication pipeline uses last known dataset
Ops_Effect: Potential use of outdated constraint information
Mitigation/Compensation: Secondary feed source + manual verification protocol

NN/IT_Cause: Schema mismatch or corrupt source data
Detection_Method: ETL validation checks + data quality metrics
Mitigation/Compensation: Reject publication + initiate investigation + notify stakeholders

System_Effect: No updated content available for distribution
Mitigation/Compensation: Fallback to previous successful build + manual investigation

NN/IT_Cause: Network interruption or target system unavailable
System_Effect: Fleet operates with mixed publication versions
Mitigation/Compensation: Retry sync + block outdated versions + notify flight ops

Local_Effect: Conflicting data from different sources incorrectly resolved
Ops_Effect: Confusion in operational planning and execution
Mitigation/Compensation: Manual review of merge conflicts + two-person validation
